metadata.description: The Empire is dying, perhaps in its final throes and the ruthless warlord Grand Admiral Thrawn may have found just the firepower needed to take a bite out of the New Republic: Some two hundred Dreadnaught heavy cruisers, lost to hyperspace in the days of the Old Republic. Luke, Leia, Han, and Chewbacca may be up against more than they bargained for!
metadata.name: Star Wars: Dark Force Rising
